purposeStrings.NSCameraUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye kwinjira kuri kamera kugirango asuzume kode ya QR
purposeStrings.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye kwinjira kuri mikoro yawe kugirango yandike amashusho yimibereho
purposeStrings.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye uburyo bwo kubika amafoto mubitabo byamafoto
purposeStrings.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Fedi akeneye kubona isomero ryamafoto yawe kugirango uhitemo itangazamakuru rya avatar yawe hamwe nu mugereka

phrases.you-are-offline: Ubu uri mu buryo bwo kudakoresha interineti

errors.actions-require-internet: Nturi kumurongo. Ibikorwa bimwe bisaba umurongo wa enterineti.
errors.admin-promotion-pending-multispend: Ntushobora kuzamura abagize itsinda kubayobozi mugihe ubutumire bwa Multispend burimo gukorwa.
errors.bad-connection: Umuyoboro wawe ushobora kuba udatunganye. nyabuneka ongera ugerageza nyuma ho gato cyangwa iyunge ku wundi muyoboro
errors.browser-feature-not-supported: Mushakisha yawe ntabwo ifite ingufu zo kwerekana icyo ushaka
errors.chat-connection-unhealthy: Umuyoboro w'ibiganiro ntabwo uterereye cyangwa nturi ku murongo. Nyabuneka gerageza kongera nyuma cyangwa wongere gufungura indi porogaramu
errors.chat-list-render-error: Hari ikosa rigaragara mu biganiro byawe
errors.chat-member-not-found: Ushobora kutabona uyu ukoresha uyu murongo
errors.chat-message-render-error: Hari ikosa rigaragara muri ubu butumwa
errors.chat-payment-failed: Ntibyashobokaga kugarura ku gihe ubwo bwishyu
errors.failed-to-list-created-communities: Kunanirwa gushyira ku rutonde imiryango yashinzwe.
errors.get-nostr-pubkey-failed: Yananiwe kugera ku nostr pub rufunguzo
errors.history-render-error: Gihuye n'ikosa riri muri iki kintu
errors.insufficient-balance: Umubare usigaye ntuhagije. Usigaje gusa {{balance}} mu mufuka wawe
errors.insufficient-balance-send: Amafaranga adahagije kugirango yemeze amafaranga. Urashobora kohereza ntarengwa {{sats}} sats
errors.internet-offline-foreign-ecash: Kunanirwa gucungura eCash. Umuyoboro wawe uri kumurongo
errors.invalid-username: Igomba kuba iri hagati y'inyuguti 1 na 21 zanditse
errors.multispend-notes-required: Nyamuneka andika intego yo gukuramo amafaranga
errors.no-address-lnurlp: Iyi aderesi ntabwo ishigikira kwishyura inkuba
errors.please-force-quit-the-app: Hari ikosa rigaragaye, nyabuneka ihutire gufunga iyo porogaramu ubundi wongere kugerageza
errors.please-grant-permission: Nyamuneka tanga uruhushya rwo gukuramo iyi dosiye
errors.please-join-a-federation: Nyamuneka winjire muri federasiyo mbere yo kwishyura ubwishyu
errors.please-join-wallet-federation: Nyamuneka winjire muri federasiyo ishyigikira ikotomoni mbere yo kwishyura ibiganiro
errors.please-select-balance-federation: Nyamuneka hitamo umuganda ufite amafaranga asigaye yo kwishyura.
errors.receive-ecash-failed: Yananiwe kwakira amafaranga mu buryo bwa eCash
errors.receive-ecash-failed-claimed: Kunanirwa kwakira eCash. Iyi eCash yamaze gusabwa
errors.receives-have-been-disabled: Ukwakira amafaranga muri iri shyirahamwe byicanze
errors.recovery-failed-connection: Kugarura konti byananiranye kubera ikibazo hamwe na connexion yawe
errors.unknown-ecash-issuer: Iki kimenyetso cya eCash cyatanzwe numuryango utari umunyamuryango

backup.beta-backup: Ikiranga Beta - kora backup ya konte yawe
backup.camera-access-information: Mu gushyiraho uburyo rusange bwo kubika, uzakenera kwemerera Fedi ikoreshe kamera yawe mu gufata amashusho agenzuwe
backup.choose-method-instructions: Mu kubika mu mufuka wawe bizagufasha kuba wagaruza amafaranga yawe niba utabashije kongera kugera kuri Fedi
backup.cloud-backup-instructions: Tangiza uburyo bwo kubika mu kirere dosiye ubashije kugaruza. Kandi uzasabwa na none kubitsa iyi dosiye mu nshuti zawe ebyiri cyangwa mu muryango wawe
backup.creating-recovery-file: Guhindura amashusho yawe muri fayili yububiko bwa Fedi yihishe ... <bold>Nibanga 100%</bold> kugeza ugerageje kugarura ikotomoni yawe
backup.hold-record-button: Ba ufatiye ho buto yo gufata hanyuma uvuge:
backup.personal-backup-description: Wibike nonaha kugirango ubashe kugarura amafaranga yawe, kuganira, namakuru yingenzi niba igikoresho cyawe cyatakaye, cyasimbuwe, cyangwa porogaramu yongeye kugarurwa.
backup.personal-backup-instructions: Andika hasi amagambo 12 ubashije kugaruza. Ibi ni iby'abanyamuryango babizobereyemo
backup.personal-backup-warning-line-1: Gusa ufite uburyo bwo kugarura ibintu.
backup.press-record-button: Kanda buto yo gufata hanyuma uvuge:
backup.recovery-words-instructions: Andika hasi ku rupapuro aya magambo ukoresheje ikaramu. Ntubike aya magambo mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhamnga mu cyuma/mashini cyawe.
backup.review-face-confirmation: Ndemeza ko ishusho yanjye yagaragara byeruye muri aya mashusho/iyi videwo
backup.review-voice-confirmation: Ndemeza ko ijwi ryanje ryakumvwa byeruye muri iyi videwo/ muri aya mashusho
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-again: Ongera uyibike na none ahandi hantu
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-where: Turakugira inama yo kubika dosiye yawe ahantu hatandukanye (messaging apps; email; cloud storage etc..)
backup.social-backup-instructions: Fata videwo mu guhamya ko ari wowe. Iyi nzira ni nziza iyo uzi neza ababicunga
backup.start-personal-backup-instructions: Fata ikaramu n'urupapuro wandike hasi amagambo wagaruje yose ku yindi sikurini
backup.start-social-backup-instructions: Ukubika rusange kugufasha kubitsa mu mutekano umufuka wawe mu nshuti zawe n'umuryango kandi abacunzi bo mu ishyirahamwe bagufasha kugaruza ibyawe iyo utabashije kongera kuyifungura
backup.successfully-backed-up: Wabashije byuzuye kubika mu mufuka wawe wa Fedi
backup.video-file-too-large: Amashusho y'iyi videwo ni manini, nyabuneka fata iri ntoya

chat.block-user-failure: Ntabwo nshobora guhagarika umukoresha. Ongera ugerageze.
chat.broadcast-admin-instructions: Aba banyamuryango barashobora kohereza ubutumwa mumatsinda yo gutangaza
chat.broadcast-no-message: Abayobozi ntibaratangaza ubutumwa kugeza ubu. Komeza utegereje.
chat.broadcast-only-notice: Psst, abayobozi ni bo bonyine bemerewe kohereza ubutumwa hano. ü§´
chat.community-chat-description: Hitamo kimwe cyangwa byinshi mubiganiro rusange kugirango wongere mumuryango wawe
chat.confirm-add-to-group: Uzi neza ko ushaka gutumira {{username}} kuri {{roomName}}?
chat.confirm-delete-message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba ubu butumwa?
chat.confirm-end-poll: Uzi neza ko ushaka kurangiza aya matora?
chat.confirm-remove-admin-from-group: Uzi neza ko ushaka gukuraho {{ukoresha izina}} nka admin? Ntibazashobora kohereza ubutumwa muri iri tsinda ariko ubutumwa boherejwe mbere buzagumaho.
chat.create-or-join-public-chat: Kora cyangwa wifatanye n'ikiganiro rusange cy'itsinda muri porogaramu ya Fedi ‚Äî kugira ngo habeho amatangazo cyangwa ibiganiro bifunguye. Bizagaragara hano kugira ngo ubashe kubyongera mu muryango wawe.
chat.first-entry-option-1: Federasiyo & Amakuru yabaturage, kuganira mumatsinda, n'ubutumwa bwihariye.
chat.go-to-direct-chat: Genda/injira ku kiganiro kiri ho ubu
chat.invalid-group: Iri si itsinda ry'ukuri ryo kuganirira ho
chat.invalid-member: Uyu si umunyamuryango w'ukuri wo kuganira na we
chat.leave-chat-confirmation: Uzi neza ko ushaka kuva muri iki kiganiro? Amateka yubutumwa bwose azabura.
chat.leave-group-confirmation: Uremeza neza/uzi neza ko ushaka kuva muri iri tsinda? Amateka y'ubutumwa bwo muri iri tsinda buzabura
chat.multispend-preview: Iri tsinda rifite ibikorwa bishya byinshi
chat.need-registration-description: Tegura gushyira ahagaragara izina ryawe kugira ngo babashe gushiya ho uburyo bwo kohereza cyangwa kwakira hamwe n'abandi
chat.no-messages: kugeza ubu nta biganiro biri ho muri iki cyumba
chat.offline-reply-error-1: Nyamuneka tegereza ubutumwa bwohereze mbere yo kubusubiza
chat.offline-reply-error-2: Ibisubizo ntibiboneka kumurongo. Nyamuneka tegereza kugeza ugarutse kumurongo.
chat.only-admins-can-vote: Abadmin bonyine ni bo bashobora gutora
chat.public-group-notice: Ubutumwa bwose buri mu matsinda rusange ntibushyirwa mu buryo buhishe. Turakugira inama yo gukoresha amatsinda yihariye mu gutumanaho by‚Äôibanga.
chat.public-group-warning: Ubutumwa bwose buri mu matsinda rusange ntibushyirwa mu buryo buhishe. Turakugira inama yo gukoresha amatsinda yihariye mu gutumanaho by‚Äôibanga. Injira kubushake bwawe.
chat.scan-member-code-notice: Erekana QR kugirango dusangire izina ukoresha
chat.search-chats-list-guidance: Shakisha amazina ukoresha mubutumwa butaziguye & amazina yitsinda kuva kuganira mumatsinda.
chat.search-chats-list-no-results: Urashobora gushakisha gusa amazina yukoresha mubutumwa bwawe butaziguye hamwe namazina yitsinda kuva muganira mumatsinda.
chat.search-chats-list-placeholder: Shakisha izina ukoresha cyangwa izina ryitsinda
chat.select-or-start: Hitamo ikiganiro cyangwa utangize ikindi gishya
chat.type-to-search-members: Andika gushakisha abanyamuryango muri iri tsinda
chat.upgrade-chat-guidance: Twakoze ku buryo ibiganiro bya Fedi biba bifite umutekano kandi bikoreshwa n'abantu batandukanye mu miryango
chat.upgrade-chat-item-subtitle-1: Vugana n'uwo ari we wese muri Fedi
chat.user-is-blocked-guidance: Uyu ukoresha arahagaritswe. Bumwe mubutumwa bwabo ntibushobora kugaragara.

communities.autojoined-community-notice: Federasiyo n'Umuryango biratandukanye. Gucunga amafaranga, <federationLink> jya kuri federasiyo yawe </federationLink>.
communities.autojoined-community-notice-federation: Federasiyo n'Umuryango biratandukanye. <UmuryangoUhuza> Shyira umuryango wawe hano </communityLink>
communities.create-info-1: Koranya ubwoko bwawe. Sangira serivisi. Komeza guhuza.
communities.create-info-2: Umwanya wo kuvuga mu bwisanzure, kubaza ibibazo, no gukora gahunda.
communities.create-info-3: Koresha Miniapps kugirango uzane serivisi abanyamuryango bakeneye.
communities.guidance-discover: Tangira ahantu uhuza, ibiganiro, na serivisi zisangiwe.
communities.guidance-join: Sikana cyangwa wandike kode yubutumire kugirango ufungure kwinjira mubaturage.
communities.leave-community-description: Uzi neza ko ushaka kuva muri uyu muryango? Urashobora gusubirana kumunsi wanyuma.
communities.onboarding-title: Umwanya wawe wa Digital Town Square

developer.default-groups-info: Kurema kumugaragaro, gutangaza-gusa itsinda kugirango rigizwe nkitsinda risanzwe abakoresha bifatanya mu buryo bwikora
developer.select-federation-share-logs: Hitamo federasiyo kugirango dusangire logs kuva

ecash.adding-to-new-wallet: Mugihe usabye ecash yawe tuzagukorera igikapo gishya {{federation_name}} nkuko utarayifite.
ecash.claim-ecash-description: Kanda kuri buto hepfo kugirango usabe ecash yawe
ecash.claim-ecash-success-description: Watsinze neza ecash yawe. Kanda kuri buto hepfo kugirango urebe ikotomoni yawe.
ecash.invalid-ecash-token-description: Ikimenyetso cyawe cya ecash ntigikwiye kandi ntigishobora gucungurwa.

federation.join-federation-guidance: Injira muri federasiyo ukunda kugirango ubone amafaranga nibindi byinshi

federations.connection-status-offline: Uyu muryango ntabwo uri kumurongo. Nyamuneka wegera abarinzi b'uyu muryango cyangwa umuyobozi w'uyu muryango kugira ngo umenye amakuru.
federations.connection-status-unstable: Uyu muryango ufite ibibazo. Nyamuneka wegera abarinzi b'uyu muryango cyangwa umuyobozi w'uyu muryango kugira ngo umenye amakuru.
federations.drawer-subtitle: Federasiyo ibamo ikotomoni yawe, amakuru na serivisi.
federations.leave-community-confirmation: Uzi neza ko ushaka kuva muri uyu muryango?
federations.leave-federation-confirmation: Uremeza ko ushaka gusohoka/kuva mu iri shyihamwe?
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-first: Uragomba gukura mo amafaranga yawe mbere ko uvamo
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-pending-stable: Gukura mo {{currency}} yawe biracyakorwa ho. Ongera ugerageze mu minota 10
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-stable-first: Uragomba gukura mo {{currency}} yawe yose asigaye mbere ko uvamo
federations.please-reconnect: Nyamuneka ongera uhuze kuri enterineti kugirango uhindure imiterere yabaturage.
federations.recover-from-scratch-warning: Icyitonderwa: Ibi bifata igihe kirekire. Ntugomba guhitamo ubu buryo keretse niba warahawe amabwiriza nubufasha bwa Fedi.

fedimods.add-mods-homescreen: Ongeraho Mini Porogaramu kuri ecran yawe ya Fedi

fedimods.first-entry-option-2: Gusa Mini Porogaramu uhitamo live hano.
fedimods.leave-page-confirmation: Uremeza ko ushaka kuva kuri iyi paji/ kuri uru rupapuro? Ibyahinduwe bishobora kutabikwa

home.backup-wallet-description: Igihe kirageze cyo kugarura imvugo yawe yimbuto kugirango amafaranga yawe abungabunge umutekano.
home.mobile-app-download-description: Kuramo porogaramu igendanwa kavukire kuburambe bwiza bwa Fedi.
home.pwa-install-banner-description: Shyira Fedi nka porogaramu kuri ecran ya home home.

multispend.abort-group-message: Itsinda rya Multispend itsinda rizahagarikwa, ubutumire bwose butegereje buzasibwa, kandi uzakenera gutangira gushiraho kuva mugitangira.
multispend.already-voted: Mumaze gutora kuri iki cyifuzo cyo gukuramo
multispend.approval-threshold-description: Shiraho umubare wabantu bakeneye kwemeza mbere yuko umunyamuryango ashobora gukuramo amafaranga.
multispend.approval-threshold-max-members: Umupaka wo kwemeza ntushobora kurenza umubare w'abatora
multispend.assign-voters-description: Hitamo uwabona gutora niba amafaranga ashobora gukurwa.

chat-events.invitation-body1: arashaka kuzamura iki kiganiro mumatsinda ya Multispend:
chat-events.invitation-body2-proposer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Kwibutsa: Huza abatora bawe kugirango wirinde ibibazo.

multispend.incomplete-notice: Group Itsinda rya Multispend rizakora nyuma yuko abatowe bose batumiwe bemeye ubutumire.
multispend.intro-1: <bold>Kubitsa Igihe icyo aricyo cyose</bold>: Umunyamuryango wese arashobora gutanga umusanzu muri pisine isangiwe.
multispend.intro-2: <bold>Gusaba gukuramo</bold>: Ukeneye gukuramo amafaranga? Ohereza icyifuzo cyo kwemererwa.
multispend.intro-3: <bold> Igenzura rya Admin </bold>: Abayobozi barashobora gutangira ubutumire cyangwa guhagarika igenamigambi mbere yo kwemezwa byuzuye.
multispend.intro-4: <bold> Clear & Transparent </bold>: Igikorwa cyose kirakurikiranwa kugirango itsinda rikomeze kumenyeshwa.
multispend.intro-5: <bold> Icyemezo cyuzuye kirakenewe </bold>: Abatora bose bagomba kwemera ubutumire bwitsinda ryinshi rigomba gushingwa.
multispend.join-federation-notice: Kugirango wemeze ubu butumire butandukanye, ugomba kwinjira muri federasiyo {{federation}}.
multispend.leave-group-message: Ntushobora kuva mumatsinda menshi niba uri gutora cyangwa admin
multispend.multispend-title: <bold>Multispend</bold>: Inzira yoroshye yo gucunga amafaranga asangiwe
multispend.multispend-unavailable-description: Imiterere ya Multispend ntabwo yashoboye muri iri tsinda
multispend.no-permission-to-vote: Ntabwo ufite uburenganzira bwo gutora kubisabwa gukuramo amafaranga.
multispend.no-rejected-withdrawal-requests: Nta muntu wigeze yangirwa gukuramo amafaranga.
multispend.no-requests-notice: Bika amafaranga kugirango ukure pisine isangiwe cyangwa usabe kubikuza niba ukeneye amafaranga.
multispend.reject-invite-message: Uzi neza ko ushaka kwanga ubu butumire bwa Multispend?
multispend.topup-stable-balance: Kubitsa bikozwe mumafaranga yawe ahamye. Amafaranga winjiye arenze asigaye. Nyamuneka shyira hejuru kugirango ukomeze.
multispend.two-voters-required: Nibura abatora 2 basabwa gushiraho itsinda ryinshi
multispend.wallet-federation-description: Amafaranga yitsinda ryanyu ahujwe na federasiyo. Ukeneye ibi kugirango wohereze cyangwa wakire amafaranga.

omni.camera-permission-denied: Genda mu iterekero uhindure ibituma kamera ikora
omni.confirm-cashu-token: Iki nikimenyetso cya Cashu, urashaka kugicungura hejuru Lightning?
omni.confirm-community-invite: Ubu ni ubutumire bwabaturage, urashaka kwinjiramo?
omni.confirm-deeplink-url: Iyi ni Fedi yimbitse, urashaka kuyifungura?
omni.confirm-ecash-token: Iyi ni eCash token, urifuza kongera kuyigarura?
omni.confirm-federation-invite: Ubu ni ubutumire bw'ishyirahamwe, urifuza kwinjira/kubiyunga ho?
omni.confirm-fedi-chat: Iyi ni ikiganiro cyo kuganira kuri {{username}}, urashaka kujyayo?
omni.confirm-fedi-chat-group-invite: Ubu ni ubutumire bwitsinda ryibiganiro, urashaka kwinjiramo?
omni.confirm-lightning-pay: Uku ni ugusaba kwishyura kwihuse, urifuza kukwishyura?
omni.confirm-lightning-withdraw: Uku ni ugusaba gukura mo amafaranga kwihuse, urifuza kuyakura mo?
omni.confirm-melt-cashu: Ohereza Cashu eCash kuri Wallet yawe ya Fedi (Amafaranga Lightning yakuweho)
omni.confirm-onchain-pay: Iyi ni onchain y'ubwishyu ya bitcoin, urashaka kuyishyura?
omni.confirm-website-url: Iyi ni webusite url, urifuza kuyifungurira mu ishakisha ryawe?
omni.error-network-message: Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze mugihe ufite aho uhurira
omni.error-network-title: Ikosa ry'urusobe, nyamuneka ongera ugerageze guhuza
omni.first-time-overlay-desc1: Sikana ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose - ohereza cyangwa wakire amafaranga, tangira ibiganiro bishya, cyangwa wongere porogaramu nto. Byose-muri-imwe ya scaneri kubintu byose Fedi.
omni.first-time-overlay-desc2: Ntushobora gusikana? Nta mpungenge. Urashobora gushira kode aho.
omni.search-placeholder-username-or-ln: Injiza izina akoresha cyangwa aderesi yihuta
omni.unsupported-bolt12: Amahirwe atangwa na BOLT 12 si benshi bayashyigikiye kugeza ubu. Ihangane
omni.unsupported-chat-invite: Iyi ni code yicyumba cyo kuganiriraho. Izina ryukoresha rigomba gutumirwa mucyumba cyo kuganiriraho mbere yo kwinjira.
omni.unsupported-legacy-chat: Iki kiganiro QR iva muri version ya porogaramu itagishyigikiwe. Ihangane
omni.unsupported-no-federation: Ntushobora kuyikoresha mbere y'uko winjira mu ishyirahamwe. Ahubwo gerageza kugenzura ubutumire bw'ishyirahamwe
omni.unsupported-on-chain: Aderesi za on-chain bitcoin ntizirashyigikorwa. Ihangane
omni.unsupported-unknown: Hmm, ubu si bwo buryo tuzi. Ihangane

onboarding.agree-terms-privacy:
Mugukomeza, wemera 
<termsLink> Amasezerano yo gukoresha </termsLink> & <privacyLink> Politiki Yibanga </privacyLink>.
onboarding.by-clicking-i-accept: Nukanda kuri "Ndemeye" uraba wemeye amabwiriza agenga uyu murimo kuri {{tos_url}}
onboarding.by-clicking-you-agree-user-agreement:
Mugukomeza, wemera
<anchor> Amasezerano yo gukoresha </anchor> & <anchor> Politiki Yibanga </anchor>
onboarding.create-info-1: Federasiyo iyobowe nabantu bizewe bita abarinzi.
onboarding.create-info-2: Abarinzi bakorera hamwe kugira ngo Federasiyo ikomeze kugira umutekano.
onboarding.create-info-3: Uku gukorera hamwe kurinda ikotomoni yawe, ubuzima bwite, kandi bikomeza Federasiyo yawe.
onboarding.create-info-4: Urashobora gushiraho Federasiyo yaba rusange (ifunguye kubantu bose) cyangwa abikorera (gutumira-gusa).
onboarding.create-info-5: Serivisi ya G-Bot ya Fedi yorohereza gushinga Federasiyo yawe ukoresheje Ikiganiro.
onboarding.description: Federasiyo ni amazu yumufuka wawe. Injira muri federasiyo ya leta cyangwa yigenga.
onboarding.description-create: Tangira Federasiyo yawe mu buryo bworoshye kandi bwihuse. Amafaranga arasabwa.
onboarding.description-create-community: Tangira ahantu uhuza, ibiganiro, na serivisi zisangiwe.
onboarding.description-join: Sikana cyangwa wandike kode yatumiwe kugirango ufungure kwinjira muri federasiyo yigenga cyangwa rusange.
onboarding.empower-tagline: Kongerera ubushobozi ikiremwamuntu ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga ry'ubwisanzure
onboarding.greeting-instructions: Ubu rero uzabasha kohereza amafaranga; vugana n'umuryango wawe n'ibindi byinshi ukoresheje Fedi
onboarding.guidance-1: Federasiyo iyobowe nabantu bizewe bita abarinzi.
onboarding.guidance-2: Abashinzwe kurinda bafatanya kurinda Federasiyo umutekano n'umutekano.
onboarding.guidance-3: Uku gukorera hamwe kurinda ikotomoni yawe, ubuzima bwite, kandi bigatuma umuryango wawe ukomera.
onboarding.guidance-public-federations: Gerageza federasiyo kuva kurutonde rwa Awesome Fedimint
onboarding.heading: Injira cyangwa Shiraho Federasiyo
onboarding.network-error: Nyamuneka wemeze ko uri kumurongo kugirango ukomeze
onboarding.new-users-disabled-notice: Ihangane, iyi federasiyo ntabwo yemera abakoresha bashya
onboarding.one-time-modal-option-1: Hejuru y'umufuka wawe wohereze, wakire, kandi uzigame amafaranga.
onboarding.one-time-modal-option-2: Injira muri federasiyo nyinshi kandi ushireho amafaranga yawe mumifuka itandukanye.
onboarding.tagline:
Guganira, amafaranga na porogaramu nto.
Bishyigikiwe n'umuryango.
onboarding.terms-url: Ukanze 'Ndemeye' wemera amasezerano ya serivisi kuri <url />
onboarding.title: Umufuka ukeneye Federasiyo
onboarding.unsupported-notice: Iyi federasiyo ntabwo ikishyigikiwe. Ntishobora kwinjizwamo.
onboarding.username-instructions: Izina ryumukoresha wawe nuburyo abandi banyamuryango bazakumenya.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-new: Nk'umunyamuryango mushya w'ishyirahamwe, uzakira ikotomoni nshya.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-returning: Nkumunyamuryango wagarutse muri federasiyo, ikotomoni yawe izagarurwa. Ibi birashobora gufata iminota mike.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-unknown: Abanyamuryango bashya bakira igikapu gishya. Abanyamuryango batahutse bazasubizwa umufuka wabo ushaje.

parser.unsupported-bolt11-zero-amount: Inyemezabwishyu z'aya mafaranga atari ho ntabwo zishyigikiwe. Kora inyemezabwishyu nshya ifite ho amafaranga wongere usubire mo

permissions.allow-camera-description: Imibare y'ibanga yasuzumwe, amazina yakoreshejwe, kohereza amafaranga n'ibindi
permissions.allow-storage-description: Ohereza dosiye, shiraho ishusho yawe, nibindi byinshi
permissions.update-later-disclaimer: Ibi bishobora gusubizwa ku gihe bwa nyuma

pin.backup-notice: Niwibagirwa ibanga ryawe, icyo wabitse ni cyo nzira yonyine yo gusubirana konti yawe
pin.recover-with-backup: Kugarura konte yawe hamwe na backup yawe
pin.recovery-notice: Niba wibagiwe PIN yawe, urashobora kugarura kwinjira kuri Fedi hamwe na backup yawe hanyuma ugakora PIN nshya.

popup.ending-description: Iyi federasiyo yigihe gito <bold>izarangira {{date}}</bold>. Amafaranga asigaye azacungwa kubushake bwabashinzwe.

quick-fact.fact-1: Urashobora kwinjira muri Federasiyo nyinshi nkuko ubishaka. Buri Federasiyo iguha igikapu gishya gitandukanye.
quick-fact.title: Amakuru y'ibanze

receive.balance-not-spendable-offline: Iyi mpirimbanyi ntishobora gukoreshwa kugeza igihe uzagarukira kumurongo
receive.lnurl-receive-notice-2: Nibyiza kububiko, abarema, cyangwa abaterankunga. Mugabane rimwe gusa kandi uhembwa inshuro nyinshi.
receive.no-incoming-funds-detected: Nta mafaranga yinjira yagaragaye. Nyamuneka gerageza nyuma.
receive.onchain-expert-only: Kubwumutekano wawe: Gumana ingano yubucuruzi munsi ya 40 kB kandi NTUGUKORESHE iyi adresse mugihe kizaza. Ibi bizafasha gukumira ibibazo byose ushobora kubitsa.
receive.receive-guidance-subtitle-1: Amafaranga arashobora gufata amasaha menshi kugirango agere.

recovery.camera-access-information: Mu gufasha hakoreshejwe igaruza, uzakenera kwemerera Fedi gukoresha kamera yawe igenzure ibanga ry'igaruza rusange
recovery.choose-method-instructions: Hitamo uburyo wakoresheje kugirango usubize ikotomoni yawe igihe winjiye bwa mbere muri federasiyo
recovery.continue-recovery-description: Gukira bizatwara igihe gito kurenza uko twari tubyiteze. Urakoze kwihangana kwawe.
recovery.create-a-new-wallet-instead: Shyira ho ububiko bushya mu mwanya wabwo
recovery.create-new-wallet-guidance: Ubu bubiko buzashobora gukoreshwa gusa kuri iki cyuma
recovery.from-different-device: Kuva ku cyuma gitandukanye ujya kuri kino
recovery.guardian-approval-instructions: Abacunga bakeneye kwemeza ko ari wowe ugaragara muri videwo ya Fedi kugira ngo bagaruze amafaranga yawe
recovery.guardian-qr-instructions: Abacunga bazakenera kugenzura uyu mubare w'ibanga QR mu gutangira gukora igaruza rusange
recovery.invalid-qr-code: Uyu mubare w'ibanga w'igaruza rusange si wo
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-1: Ushobora kuba wasangije inshuti zawe iyi dosiye cyangwa warayibitse mu myanya itandukanye yindi
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-3: Izina rya dosiye ya Fedi igaragara nka:
recovery.locked-device-guidance-1: Ububiko bw'iki cyuma bwajyanywe mu kindi cyuma
recovery.locked-device-guidance-3: Niba wifuza gushyira ho ububiko bushya muri iki cyuma, nyabuneka siba wongere gushyira mo Fedi üëç
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-1: Fedi ishobora gukoreshwa kuri telefoni imwe gusa mu gihe kimwe. Kugira ngo uhere konti yawe hano mu mutekano:
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-3: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Kura Fedi kuri iyi telefoni hanyuma uyishyireho bundi bushya
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-4: ‚ö†Ô∏è Banza ubike kugira ngo utabura uburyo bwo kubona amafaranga yawe!
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-2:
Noneho, kura Fedi kuri iyi telefoni hanyuma uyishyireho bundi bushya.

 Ibuka gukoresha amagambo wanditse kugira ngo ugarure konti yawe.
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-3: Niba ukeneye ubufasha, <anchor>kanda hano</anchor> kugira ngo uhamagare ikipe yacu y'ubufasha
recovery.nothing-to-download: Nta kintu twafungura kuva mu bacunga
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed-instructions: Ukubika dosiye {{fileName}} byanze ko ifunguka. nyabuneka gerageza kandi ugaruze uturutse mu yindi waba rashyize ahantu hantu
recovery.paste-social-recovery-code: Shyira ho umubare w'ibanda wa social recovery
recovery.paste-social-recovery-code-instead: Ahubwo shyira ho umubare w'ibanga wa social recovery
recovery.personal-recovery-instructions: Injiza amagambo 12 wanditse igihe wabikaga bwa mbere mu bubiko bwawe
recovery.personal-recovery-method: Niba waranditse amagambo 12 wabashije kugaruza, ongera uyinjize kugira ngo ugaruze ububiko bwawe
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-1: Umunyamuryango muri kumwe amerewe neza, aratuje; nta kimuhungabanya
recovery.recovery-assist-description: Umunyamuryango wa Fedi arasaba ubufasha bwo kugaruza umufuka we
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-1: 1. Genzura niba umunyamuryango atuje kandi afite umutekano
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-3: 3. Reba videwo yabo ya Fedi yabitswe
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-4: 4. Emeza ko byari umuntu umwe muri videwo yabitswe
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-5: 5. Emeza cyangwa uhakane ugusaba kugaruza amafaranga y'abanyamuryango
recovery.recovery-assist-thank-you: Wakoze kuba wafashije umunyamuryango kugaruza amafaranga ye
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-1: Reba iyi videwo wemeze umwirondoro w'umunyamuryango
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-2: None se iyi videwo irerekana umunyamuryango umwe uri kugerageza gukora ubu igaruza rusange?
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-no: Oya, umuntu wagaragaye muri videwo si umwe mu banyamuryango
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-yes: Yego, umuntu wagaragaye muri videwo ni umwe wo mu banyamuryango
recovery.recovery-in-progress-balance: Igaruza riri gukorwa. Amafaranga asigaye araza kuba ahari vuba
recovery.recovery-in-progress-chat-payments: Igaruza riri gukorwa. ibiganiro birebana no Kwishyura biraza gutangira vuba
recovery.recovery-in-progress-payments: Igaruza riri gukorwa. Kwishyura biraza gutangira vuba
recovery.select-a-device-guidance: Hitamo igikoresho cyo kwimura ikotomoni ihari kuva.
recovery.social-recovery-instructions: Fungura dosiye ya social recovery Fedi yafunguwe igihe wafataga ukabika ya videwo. Turagusaba kuyibika no kuyigabana n'inshuti
recovery.social-recovery-method: Nufata videwo, wahura n'abarinzi kugira ngo bemeze umwirondoro wawe
recovery.social-recovery-unsuccessful-instruction: Gerageza kugaruka ku barinzi kandi ugaragaze umwirondoro wabo
recovery.successfully-opened-fedi-file: Dosiye yawe yo muri Fedi yafunguwe neza
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-1: Iki kizazana ububiko bwawe ukoresha ubu muri iki cyuma kandi bifunge ububiko bwo ku kindi cyuma
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-2: Ntabwo ukeneye icyuma cya kera mu gukora iyimura
recovery.wallet-moved-desc: Ubu irakora kurindi gikoresho. Gushiraho igikapu gishya hano, ongera ushyire Fedi.

send.cancel-notes-warning: Uzi neza ko ushaka guhagarika kohereza eCash?
send.ecash-recipient-notice: Uwakiriye agomba kuza kumurongo gusaba eCash. Kureka Kohereza bizarinda gusaba eCash.
send.offline-send-warning: Ku rundi rwego, QR niramuka igaragaye, sats izakurwa mu bubiko bwawe

currency-names.czk: Koruna ryo muri Repubulika ya Czechoslovaquie
currency-names.eur: Amayero yo mu bihugu byunze ubumwe by'i Burayi
currency-names.pen: Ifaranga rya Peru ryitwa Peruvian Nuevo Sol
currency-names.uyu: Ifaranga ryo muri Uruguay ryitwa Peso
currency-names.ves: ifaranga ryo muri Boliviya ryitwa Bolivares
currency-names.zar: Ifaranga rya Afurika y'Epfo ryitwa Randa

settings.repair-wallet-confirmation: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusana ikotomoni yawe? GUSA kora ibi niba iyobowe ninama ya Fedi.
settings.repair-wallet-description: Ntukoreshe iki gikoresho keretse kiyobowe ninama ya Fedi.

stabilitypool.amount-may-vary-during-withdraw: Umubare ushobora guhinduka mu gihe cyo kubikuza
stabilitypool.deposits-disabled-by-federation: Kubitsa mumafaranga ahamye byahagaritswe na Federasiyo
stabilitypool.max-stable-balance-amount: Umubare wo hejuru w'ayasigaye wamaze kugerwa ho
stabilitypool.no-bitcoin-notice: Ugomba kugira  bitcoin yo kubitsa muri{{currency}} n'asigara
stabilitypool.pending-withdrawal-blocking: Ihangane utegereze inzira y'amafaranga atarakurwaho mbere y'uko wakora indi mirimo yo kubitsa cyangwa kubikuza

support.analytics-consent-description: Mudufashe gukora Fedi neza mugusangira imikoreshereze rusange ya porogaramu. Nta makuru yihariye. Kuramo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose.
support.effective-support-1b: kugira ngo tubashe kuguha ubufasha bwiza bushoboka.
support.effective-support-2a: Ntushaka gusangiza? Nta kibazo! Ushobora gukomeza gusura
support.enter-ticket-number: Injiza nimero ya ticket watanzwe n‚Äôitsinda ryacu.
support.how-to-launch: Niba ukeneye ubufasha, urashobora gutangiza ikiganiro cyo kugoboka ukanze buto hepfo.
support.log-disclaimer: Ntugakoreshe iyi fomu keretse ubisabwe n‚ÄôInama ya Fedi. Banza utange ikibazo <anchor>aha</anchor>.
support.title: Baza Fedi
support.zendesk-initialization-failed: Ntabwo twashoboye kugera kubiganiro byingoboka. Nyamuneka reba umurongo wa enterineti hanyuma ugerageze.

wallet.join-federation: Injira muri federasiyo kugirango ukoreshe ikotomoni yawe
wallet.show-fiat-txn-amounts-info: Amafaranga yo gucuruza azerekanwa mumafaranga yatoranijwe
